attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anywhere in the world, racial hatred,tension,any sorts of racial abuse is not allowed, yet here in england, we have facebook groups etc with people clearly saying they want foreigners and 'pakis' to 'f**k off'
Its disgusting.
what happened to equal rights and being human?
Why isnt there a tougher law!!!!Somethign really serious has to happen like stabbings,murders for the people to be punished.
